name: Do summons worth it at level 40 environment? Question for Wizard/Sorcerer
author: NobleSky

posts.author: NobleSky
posts.content:
Do summons worth the spell slot or feat slot in the case of epic summon at level 40 environment? I'm currently running a Wizard 35/ Rogue 3/ SD 2 character and he's wearing robe. Currently I'm playing near the end of interlude chapter of SoU module and even with my henchman and animal companion (panther), my spider summon (from summon creature IV) don't last long against horde of red slaads. I wonder if this is going to become a trend in the long run where summons will eventually become obsolete and at best summons become a distraction against enemies or at worst, a waste of spell slot in modules with level 40 like Sands of Fate? Or maybe this is the case where my tactics are not good enough against trash mobs as spellcaster. I'm trying to compile a list of summons that I think might be worth it.


Spell name Spell lvl Summon Pro Con
Greater planar binding 8 Celestial Avenger High AC and AB Only available for Good alignment
Create undead 8 Spectre undead immunities to critical hits, death magic, disease, level drain, ability drain, mind-affecting spells, paralysis, poison, and sneak attack Frail with 18 AC and 55 HP; won't last long against hard hitting enemies and there are more optimized undead summons
Summon creature IX 9 Elder air/fire/water elemental elemental immunities to critical hits, disease, mind-affecting spells, paralysis, poison, and sneak attacks Can't control which elemental to summon so you might have to rest and recast the spell; might struggle against enemies with element damage immunity
Gate 9 Balor high AC and AB with moderate HP and bunch of fire spells like destruction, fireball, fire storm, implosion, and meteor swarm (limited use per day) Need to have a 'protection against element' spell line active when summoning to keep it friendly; might struggle against enemies with fire element immunity
Black blade of disaster 9 Black blade of disaster Immune to damage with high AB and can instant kill any enemies that fails 17 DC fortitude saving throws Vulnerable to Dispel or Mordenkainen's disjunction spells; you can't take any actions that would undo your summon such as attacking, casting a spell (including spells from items), counterspelling, disabling a trap, flagging a trap, picking a pocket, and taunting
Epic spell dragon knight Epic Red dragon Dragon immunities to mind-affecting spells, paralysis and sneak attacks plus immunity to fear. It has permanent true seeing. Limited use per day of aura of dragon fear, fire breath, dispel magic, flame arrow, and Isaac's lesser missile storm Need to invest in epic spell dragon knight feat; summons have large size so can't pass small door or hallway
Epic spell mummy dust Epic Warrior lord Undead immunities to critical hits, death magic, disease, level drain, ability drain, mind-affecting spells, paralysis, poison, and sneak attacks;  inflicts poison on-hit, which causes 1 or 2 points of dexterity damage if a fortitude save is failed against a DC of 22; can use aura of fear once per day Need to invest in epic spell mummy dust feat; frail with 24 AC and 143 HP
